\mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacegft_1_1Color_a41b5a3a9b4d326bee9a05ad926ab4550}\label{namespacegft_1_1Color_a41b5a3a9b4d326bee9a05ad926ab4550}} 
\index{gft::Color@{gft::Color}!Triplet@{Triplet}}
\index{Triplet@{Triplet}!gft::Color@{gft::Color}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{Triplet()}{Triplet()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily int gft\+::\+Color\+::\+Triplet (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{int}]{a,  }\item[{int}]{b,  }\item[{int}]{c }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Converts a color to hexadecimal format (a hex triplet). 

The hex triplet is formed by concatenating three bytes of color channels (24-\/bit color scheme). A hex triplet corresponds to a six-\/digit hexadecimal number. \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacegft_1_1Color_ac4657f5e13a1085573ed19bcd20c0ed6}\label{namespacegft_1_1Color_ac4657f5e13a1085573ed19bcd20c0ed6}} 
\index{gft::Color@{gft::Color}!YCbCr2RGB@{YCbCr2RGB}}
\index{YCbCr2RGB@{YCbCr2RGB}!gft::Color@{gft::Color}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{YCbCr2RGB()}{YCbCr2RGB()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily int gft\+::\+Color\+::\+Y\+Cb\+Cr2\+R\+GB (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{int}]{v }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Converts the color from the Y\+Cb\+Cr color space to R\+GB color space.
